page.title: 17 SPORTS IN LEWES
page.content: You can play{tennis}at the private Southdown Club on floodlit all-weather courts,or on the public courts of Con- vent Field under the shadow of Priory ruins. Lewes{Golf}Course occupies Mt. Caburn's slopes, or there is{putting on the grassed-over Priory ruins. { Rugby and cricket}are played at Stanley Turner Ground and local teams play{football,cricket,hockey and bowls at Convent Field and the Dripping Pans There are other sports grounds at the Paddock, Malling and Landport. {Badminton, boxing, judo, winter {athletics,}all function in community halls or school gymnasia,for Lewes has {no indoor Sports Hall}yet.Nor is there a covered swimming pool,though in warm weather, Pells chilly outdoor pool is popular. Many Lewesians do their own thing:{riding, walking the Downs, {cycling, or "keeping fit".
